define [
  'Factory'
  'BackboneFactory'
], (Factory, BackboneFactory) ->
  'use strict'

¶ Oraculum

Oraculum is the distillation of Chaplin's excellent behaviors broken out into reusable modules called mixins. This project is the logical extreme of the design factory/composer pattern exposed by FactoryJS.

See
https://github.com/lookout/factoryjs

¶ Creation

Create a new Factory container for all of our mixins and definitions. Pass an anonymous function that returns our base factory, BackboneFactory. Finally, add 'Oraculum' as our base tag, so our definitions will inherit it.

 
  Oraculum = new Factory (-> BackboneFactory), baseTags: ['Oraculum']

¶ Extension

Mirror all current and future definitions from BackboneFactory

 
  Oraculum.mirror BackboneFactory

¶ Distribution

Finally, export and return the object to be used

 
  return window.Oraculum = Oraculum
